website_summaries.verdict: Choose them if you prefer a salmon snack for your dogs in a grain-free recipe.
pros: A popular grain-free option that combines natural salmon with a variety of vegetables
Also contains a probiotic that helps promote healthy digestion
cons: Many owners are thrilled that their dogs love them, but not so happy about the strong fishy aroma
Pricier than Plato treats with grains

customer_reviews.title: Order not fresh
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bad rating regarding a product purchased from Amazon. When I opened the bag, I noticed there was a very stale odor and the treats were very dark compared to the usual light color. They were also very mushy and easy to crumble, when they are usually somewhat hard and takes a little force to crumble. Not sure if this was just a bad batch but couldn't return; just threw them away. I reordered the same treats but through a different company. Hopefully, they are received fresh!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tarron

customer_reviews.title: I like that these treats are grain free and made in ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats, however she prefers the plain salmon flavor. They are pungent, but that doesn't seem to bother my mini bull terrier, in fact, that makes it more appealing to her. I like that these treats are grain free and made in the US. I liked them even better a year ago before the price went up significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Kellytoos

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and safe treats
customer_reviews.text: My 2 little dogs are allergic to chicken, so upon the recommendation of my vet, I feed them solely salmon/fish products. I have been giving them these treats for the past 6 months and they love them! The prime ingredient is salmon followed by vegetables. The texture is soft and crumbly. Thank you Plato!
customer_reviews.author: SiouxBuck

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely picky about what my animals eat. I like to give them variety and excellent nutrition. My dog is allergic to beef products and Plato offers a nice selection of different meats in their treats. We usually get the Salmon and Vegetables and the bag typically contains slightly different lengths in one bag, so I can opt to give my dog a larger snack or smaller piece as I feel guided. I like the fact that I can give a nutritious snack with vegies and meat. My dog LOVES these!
customer_reviews.author: Serenity

customer_reviews.title: These come in a variety of flavors and are perfect for very old dogs who have difficulty chewing hard ...
customer_reviews.text: These come in a variety of flavors and are perfect for very old dogs who have difficulty chewing hard biscuits. They have a texture somewhat similar to pliable shredded wheat so you can break them up for smaller mouths or to make one snack seem like three (ah the tricks we foolishly use to try to pull one over on our way too smart dogs).
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Healthier treat my dogs love.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love the Plato treats. It’s difficult for me to keep some on hand with 3 dogs. They’re special, so I spoil them. The ingredients look good, so I will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey's Mom

customer_reviews.title: We love them, the dog's GI tract does not
customer_reviews.text: SO bummed. These seem like a great product with great ingredients. I tried this instead of the chicken which is too dry and turns to dust. The consistency of these are great- easy to break apart and put in toys. The smell is pretty horrible, but hey, dogs love it. Just wish her stomach could tolerate it.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Good treats for bulldogs
customer_reviews.text: Great treat for my two English Bulldogs. They love the grain free salmon and vegetable treats. However, about half of the time I receive them from Amazon the treats are too dry and seem stale and no longer fresh. The other half of the time the treats feel moist and fresh like when I buy them at local pet store. My dogs still eat them, and they love them, but I fear that the box more than likely is exposed to the sun too long and dries up the treats.
customer_reviews.author: Haze Corps

customer_reviews.title: The dog gives it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: I can only go by how the dog responds - he loves them, eats them up and looks for more, so it must be a 5 star review ! I do see the price often varies wildly....I pay $9ish, but have seen as high as $16 (both with free shipping). Does it smell? yes, somewhat....but only when I open the package...worth it to me to have my dog happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie From BoontonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My two German Shepherds love these treats
customer_reviews.text: My two large dogs love these treats. They have a very slight fish smell and they are small oblong treats so for large dogs you may go through them fast so I usually keep several bags on had. They may be sitting on the shelf a while because they are not as fresh as if I purchase them directly from a brick and mortar store but my dogs just love them.
customer_reviews.author: Eckert

customer_reviews.title: My dog can't get enough.
customer_reviews.text: My dog goes CRAZY for these. He was introduced to them through his BarkBox subscription and went crazy when I ran out! I love the Plato brand. Have had a couple of other treats from them and he likes them as well. Although I think these will always be his fav. And I don't worry about where they are sourced and ingredients. Having a dog with severe food allergies, it is nice to have a source I trust.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Amato

customer_reviews.title: Great Snacks!
customer_reviews.text: My yorkie-poo loves these. Great amount of snacks in the bag for the price. I will usually go through a bag in a month to a month and a half, and that's if I give her one to two snacks a day. The size of the snacks is also great for a small to medium sized dog (slightly smaller than the size of a normal size pack of gum).
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very dry
customer_reviews.text: My dog use to love these treats but now they are hard and have changed color it hurts my dog intestines, they also don't smell like they used to. Every time I order the price keeps getting higher like every 3 weeks. I'm going to buy them locally, the price is no different and I can just return them when they are dry.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Daisy Approved!
customer_reviews.text: My Golden Retriever, Daisy, received these treats for Christmas from a friend. She loved them so much I felt some pressure to find more of them for her. And I was so glad to find them on Amazon. So now she can continue to have 2 of these, as her appetizer, on top of her dinner each evening. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Cozy Mystery Lover

customer_reviews.title: Tasty treats!!
customer_reviews.text: Very strong fishy smell, but OH BOY! My little dog loves these, and she's a complete fusspot. I like that they're American made, can be trusted. She could make a meal of them, but we dole them out sparingly.
customer_reviews.author: Vtyaker

customer_reviews.title: good high value treat.
customer_reviews.text: my dog is crazy for these and they are made well with quality ingredients. The last few bags of plain salmon treats we have had form this company have been dry and crumbly, but these have been a good, solid treat thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie O. Siemer

customer_reviews.title: Dog treats your dog will love
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love them a lot more than the other organic treats I bought them. They have a good list of quality ingredients too. I like to break them in half to conserve them also, definitly kinda smelly when handling though.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: A Healthy treat
customer_reviews.text: These don’t crumble so they’re good for training and going on walks.
customer_reviews.author: lost lenore

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & with probiotics
customer_reviews.text: My Bernese loves these!!! They are stinky though so buyer beware. This is a high quality product though, over 90% meat and enhanced with probiotics. My pup has always had a touchy stomach and these seem to have helped.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: The pet treats are very good. My dog really likes them I had purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: The pet treats are very good. My dog really likes them I had purchased them before and knew he was very happy with them .Then I got some from another vender that were date expired and the dog wouldn't even touch them. So always check the expiration date and make sure you are getting fresh product when you buy.
customer_reviews.author: M. North

customer_reviews.title: Truly natural
customer_reviews.text: I feel good about giving this to my dog. The ingredients are truly natural. They don't break up as easily as the chicken ones do. They do have a "fish food" smell to them, but my dog likes them, so I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: LMH

customer_reviews.title: Great Treats for our picky dog!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats and she is picky, picky. She checks our mailbox everyday for the delivery. :)))
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We’ve been purchasing these for the past year. Our ...
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been purchasing these for the past year. Our pup loves these. The last two bags we received were all crumbled. Ugh
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Stinky magic
customer_reviews.text: These treats are great. They stink like fish, and if you leave the bag open, you'll wonder why your house smells like fish. But serious, my dog asks for them whenever he is near the counter.
customer_reviews.author: sydney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: item arrived on time and described correctly. most importantly, my dog LOVES them!!! very stinky
customer_reviews.author: nelson

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have to avoid chicken by-products and wheat products, so these are a great treat for them. They love them. They're a little big for small dogs, but I just break them in half.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Mugridge

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love these treats. The salmon and veg are softer and easier to break for training.than other varieties. I've been buying Plato brand for years.they're reasonably priced for the amount you get.
customer_reviews.author: JJoz

customer_reviews.title: My boxer loves these EOS Plato makes very good doggie treats
customer_reviews.text: My boxer loves these EOS Plato makes very good doggie treats. No fillers no grains and the dogs seem to love them!
customer_reviews.author: R. G. Twombly

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 whether my dogs like or not
customer_reviews.text: its okay.. 50/50 whether my dogs like or not.. Nothing extraordinary and a lot were broken prior to arrival due to non protective packaging..
customer_reviews.author: Tom B

customer_reviews.title: Plato's Treats - 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: This flavor stink like potent fish food, but the dogs LOVE them! They are easy to break up into smaller pieces. 1 treat can easily be broken into quarters.
customer_reviews.author: Julie F

customer_reviews.title: Awesome treats for my Boomet!
customer_reviews.text: My dog jumps up & down & squeals when he sees just the bag. He knows this bag fr all the others too!!!! Loves these great treats & so great for him too!'!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Stinky, but in a good way for a dog.  :)
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES these treats. These stink up the room, but it's worth it for a few minutes. His coat seems to have improved a few months after starting with these. I don't know if these are responsible, but I'm certain the salmon has to help.
customer_reviews.author: exiled

customer_reviews.title: 96 and my dog loved them. Was about to reorder and see the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in Feb., 2016 for $8.96 and my dog loved them. Was about to reorder and see the cost is now $17.99. Price has doubled in a little over a year. I'm not giving this 1 star for quality, but for the double price. I'm passing and will find something else!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Prunty

customer_reviews.title: Only the best will do
customer_reviews.text: A great treat from Plato, the dogs love the Market Chicken and the Salmon A treat that I'm very happy Plato came out with, the #1 Plato treat.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Wyzykoski

customer_reviews.title: Doggie approved!
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are a nice size, not too big, not too small. Soft enough for dogs with "missing" teeth to eat as well.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very picky dog loves these treats and they do not upset his older gentle stomach!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin M

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few treats I'll give my dogs. It has good ingredients and I trust that the company sources them well.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Fish treat
customer_reviews.text: The package was bigger than I thought it would be. It does have a fishy smell to it once you open the bag but it is a fish product. My dogs love these treats they get super excited when I pull the bag out for them to feed.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has many allergies. This brand carries more options for him. He loves them
customer_reviews.author: Mia S.

customer_reviews.title: We think Maggie is the best testimonial!
customer_reviews.text: These helped our Lab Maggie get through GI issues associated with a long regimen of antibiotics. She wouldn't eat her food with the Probiotic powder from the vet, but loves these treats & she is doing very well. We think Maggie is the best testimonial!
customer_reviews.author: Jan M. Failing

customer_reviews.title: Superb grain free treats
customer_reviews.text: I have used these treats for several years. Grain free, high quality and my dogs LOVE them.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom

customer_reviews.title: Plato Dog Treats
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately theses were as hard as nails. . . . . Old product. When I buy them locally, at pet store, they are nice and soft. . . . . Fresh
customer_reviews.author: good customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 fussy dogs, and they absolutely love these biscuits! Then run back for more!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, smelly treat
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, smelly dog treat. My dog is somewhat indifferent to food and that makes it hard to reward her for good behavior. But these treats smell, which attracts her attention, and they are tasty enough that she wants to earn them.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 2 labs love these treats and they cost so much less than at the natural food market
customer_reviews.author: brenda renner

customer_reviews.title: A little fishy but my little guy loves them
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying out different brands and types of treats for my pup as training treats. These are the first he's gone for with any enthusiasm and are working nicely. They are a little strong on the smell, and I obviously break the treats up into much smaller pieces for my little guy and the purpose I've bought them for, but overall I'm happy with this product and the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Double-You

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: dogs love them. They are made in the USA which will always be a plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: Loralie

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA and our dogs love these.
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love these and they're made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Detective Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Great treat for allergic dog, and good for his coat!
customer_reviews.text: Good treat my allergic dog! No grains or other irritants in it, and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: scruffmom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love them and I love that they are a healthy treat.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Hollister

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a treat my pup really likes! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: theCorndogman

customer_reviews.title: Your dog will go crazy
customer_reviews.text: My dog goes crazy for these, likes them more than $20 Somewhat gourmet dog beef jerky sticks
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: My little ones love these treats
customer_reviews.text: My little ones love these treats! I have a Cocker Spaniel with allergies, and a Chiweenie with no allergies who they both love them and I'm happy knowing they are healthy treats.
customer_reviews.author: Pennipeg

customer_reviews.title: Dog craves the blend of salmon and her fav veggies
customer_reviews.text: YUMMMMMM Dogs love salmon and the veggies make it even better
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C Mache

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love them and this is the best price I found. Great delivery and healthy treats.
customer_reviews.author: lajana

customer_reviews.title: My go-to dog treat
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to treat. They break apart easy, almost all dogs go for these, when no other treat will get their attention. I teach classes and if a dog simply isn't interested, I dig around to see if I have any of these in my pouch. Great value for the price and quality. Good ingredients, big bag. Very happy with the Plato brand. The only downside is that I do have to break these up into about a dozen little treats for each "bar" they come in. But, I put the bars in my treat pouch and break them up while I have the dogs sit, stay, heel, etc. It really keeps their attention!
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love Plato treats! My doggy goes crazy for them!
customer_reviews.author: Peachy Peach

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these! She has an ultra-sensitive tummy and tolerates these really well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Atchison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients ate good and my dog simply loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Ladage

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it. They have allergies to chicken and beef ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it. They have allergies to chicken and beef so it is a great option to have.
customer_reviews.author: Meejung Park

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I just love these treats! My finicky chihuahua won't eat anything but she gobbles up the organic chicken treats#!
customer_reviews.author: patricia stephens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves these smelly treats! Also appreciate the ingredients, as salmon is the first on the list!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my dog happy. i'm happy. she has allergies and can have fish.
customer_reviews.author: patricia walldov

customer_reviews.title: my dogs love them and they are made with great products
customer_reviews.text: Simple, my dogs love them and they are made with great products!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these! I deducted a star because they have a very! strong odor.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna Krause

customer_reviews.title: Probiotic treat for dogs
customer_reviews.text: My shih tzu puppy loves these treats. They have quite an unpleasant smell, and my hands end up smelling like fish after touching one treat. But since my puppy loves them so much, I just hold my breath when opening the bag and wash my hands afterwards. One treat is too big to give to my puppy whole, so I break it up into about 5-6 pieces. The probiotic coating definitely works and is the main reason why I will continue buying this product. I love this brand because they use non-GMO ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: yisar

customer_reviews.title: Terrible smell!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these but they smell AWFUL! I was hoping the fish smell wouldn't be as strong, definitely mistaken! Make sure to wash your hands after handling them otherwise you'll smell fishy too
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: We been buying Plato doggy treat for our dogs for ...
customer_reviews.text: We been buying Plato doggy treat for our dogs for over 2 years already and after 2 years my dog still loves it, so that should mean it is good
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lu

product_meta.title: PLATO Dog Treats - Farmers Market Salmon and Vegetables
product_meta.description: Plato Farmers Market Real Strips Salmon & Vegetables recipe are grain-free with NO added sugars, artificial preservatives, by-products, artificial colors, protein-meals, soy, wheat, corn, fillers, and freeze-drying. These single-source novel protein treats are slow roasted in our very own US Facility- especially good for dogs with skin issues, allergies, and food sensitivities. Real Strips duck, chicken, and salmon with fresh veggies from local farms, aid in digestion, skin & coat, and circulation.
feature_bullets: Healthy Snack – Our Treats Have No Added Sugars, Artificial Preservatives, By-Products, Artificial Colors, Protein-Meals, Soy, Wheat, Corn, Fillers, Or Freeze-Drying.

Ingredients – Best All Natural Pet Treat On The Market. Plato Uses The Highest Percent Of Quality, Protein On The Market. Treats Are 90% Pure Meat. We Procure All Ingredients Straight From The Source. This Guarantees Plato Pet Treats Is The Most Healthy Dog Treat Made In The Usa.
Benefits & Recommendations– Helps Digestion, Excellent Source Of Omega 3, 6, Fatt Acids, Veggies.This Dog Snack Is Grain Free And A Probiotic.
A Treat For Sensitive Pets - These Single-Source Novel Protein Treats Are Slow Roasted In Our Very Own Us Facility- Especially Good For Dogs With Skin Issues, Allergies, And Food Sensitivities.
Great For Training – Dogs Are Amazing, But Sometimes They Need A Little Training. One Of The Best Ways To Motivate Your Dog Or Puppy Is With A Treat That They Love! Canines Love Plato Dog Treats!
